page.title: 12SHOPS IN OAKE AND MILVERTON
page.content:
THE MAIN FOOD SHOP IN MILVERTON IS SPAR. IT SELLS FOOD, SWEETS, CLOTHES, VIDEOS AND TOYS. IT IS VERY BIG FOR A VILLAGE SHOP. IT HAS JUST BEEN PAINTED WITH BRIGHT, WHITE PAINT, AND LOOKS VERY LIGHT AND CHEERFUL INSIDE. IT IS OPEN FROM 8.00 AM. UNTIL 9.00 PM SIX DAYS A WEEK. WE INTERVIEWED SOME OF THE CUSTOMERS. WHEN WE WERE THERE FOUR MOTHERS CAME INTO THE SHOP WITH LITTLE CHILDREN IN 15 MINUTES. THEY COME TO SPAR FOR LITTLE THINGS BUT GO TO TAUNTON FOR MOST OF THEIR FOOD.
IN OAKE VILLAGE THERE IS ONLY ONE SHOP. IT IS THE POST OFFICE. IT SELLS SWEETS, STAMPS, FOOD, SEEDS, TOYS AND ICE CREAMS. MOST OF THE MUMS GO TO TAUNTON FOR THEIR FOOD BECAUSE THE SHOP IS SO SMALL. THE POST OFFICE HAS A SMALL GARDEN FULL OF ROSES.
